Text.Page:
As much as I'd like to keep you here, , the Coastal Overwatch needs you more.

Just keep following the road south, then cross the narrow channel. You should be within sight of the overwatch at that point.

We'll miss having s like you around, that's for sure.

It looks like the nagas are trying to open Dagon's Tomb and awaken their creator-god. I don't know how versed you are in theology, but Dagon isn't one of the fuzzy gods.

We've got our work cut out for us.
